item.title: 中国 Deepseek 将非高峰期定价最高下调 75
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司DeepSeek周三表示，在格林尼治标准时间16时30分至0时30分之间，使用其API（一个允许其他应用程序和网络产品开发商整合其人工智能模型的平台）的成本将降低75%。【原文：Chinese AI startup DeepSeek said on Wednesday that between 1630 GMT and 0030 GMT, the cost of using its API, a platform that allows developers of other apps and web products to integrate its AI models, would be up to 75% cheaper.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发担忧，台湾小幅下调2025年GDP增长预期
item.description: 台湾经济依赖贸易，预计 2025 年的增长速度将低于之前的预测，美国可能征收的关税以及议会实施的预算削减将带来动荡威胁。【原文：Taiwan's trade-reliant economy is expected to grow at a slower pace in 2025 than previously forecast, with the threat of turbulence from tariffs that may be imposed by the United States, as well as parliament-imposed budget cuts.】

item.title: 德国大选后债券收益率小幅上升
item.description: 德国基准国债收益率周一上升，原因是德国大选结果支持了对有利于增长的政策的预期，但并未消除为增加财政支出而进行债务制动改革的不确定性。【原文：Yields on benchmark German government bonds rose on Monday as the outcome of German general elections supported expectations for pro-growth policies, but did not lift the uncertainty around the reform of the debt brake to increase fiscal spending.】

item.title: 聚焦：从时尚到汽车，俄罗斯市场对正在权衡回归的西方品牌构成新考验
item.description: 华盛顿推动迅速结束乌克兰冲突，引发了西方品牌可能希望重返俄罗斯的猜测，但从时装到汽车，他们撤出的市场现在看起来比三年前更具竞争力。【原文：Washington's push to swiftly end the conflict in Ukraine has sparked speculation that Western brands may want to return to Russia, but from fashion to cars, the markets they vacated now look more competitive than three years ago.】

item.title: 保时捷任命新首席财务官和销售主管以重振业绩
item.description: 豪华汽车制造商保时捷周三更换了首席财务官和销售主管，换上了两位公司资深人士，同时对董事会进行了重组，希望借此重振下滑的业绩和疲软的股价。【原文：Luxury carmaker Porsche replaced its CFO and head of sales on Wednesday with two company veterans as it reshuffles its board in the hopes of reviving flagging performance and a weak share price.】

item.title: 印度在 14 亿美元税款纠纷中单挑大众，称起亚纠正了方向
item.description: 法庭文件显示，尽管竞争对手起亚在被起诉后改变了做法，但印度税务部门仍将大众汽车列为唯一一家在 12 年中对其进口汽车进行错误分类以逃避 14 亿美元税款的汽车制造商。【原文：Indian tax authorities have singled out Volkswagen as the only automaker to wrongly classify its car imports for 12 years to evade $1.4 billion in taxes, even as rival Kia changed its practice after being pulled up, court papers show.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚将从 3 月 1 日起使用基准煤炭价格进行交易
item.description: 印尼能源与矿产资源部高级官员 Tri Winarno 周三表示，从 3 月 1 日起，印尼将开始使用政府制定的基准煤炭价格作为交易底价。【原文：Indonesia will start using its government-set benchmark coal price as the floor price for transactions starting from March 1, Tri Winarno, a senior official at the Energy and Mineral Resources Ministry, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Parexel 公司高管称印度即将成为临床试验中心
item.description: 合同研究公司Parexel的一位高管周三告诉路透社，印度已准备好作为早期临床试验的替代地点，以帮助减轻俄乌战争等干扰因素的影响。【原文：India is ready to step in as an alternative site for early-stage clinical trials to help mitigate the impact of disruptions such as the Russia-Ukraine war, an executive at contract research firm Parexel told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印尼称苹果很快就能销售 iPhone 16s
item.description: 印尼工业部长周三表示，在双方就包括一家制造工厂和一个研发中心在内的多项交易达成一致后，苹果公司将很快能够在印尼销售其 iPhone 16 手机。【原文：Apple will soon be able to sell its iPhone 16 phones in Indonesia after the two sides agreed on a number of deals, including a manufacturing plant and a research and development centre, the industry minister said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 德国监管机构评估联合信贷银行收购德国商业银行 29.99% 股份的出价
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的一位发言人周三表示，该银行已将其收购德国商业银行 29.99% 少数股权的计划上报德国卡特尔办公室进行评估。【原文：Italian lender UniCredit has reported its planned acquisition of a 29.99% minority stake in Germany's Commerzbank to the German Cartel Office for assessment, a spokesperson for the regulator said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚加强石油储备，寻求推迟美国对石油公司 NIS 的制裁
item.description: 塞尔维亚能源部长杜布拉夫卡-杰多维克-汉达诺维奇（Dubravka Djedovic Handanovic）周三表示，塞尔维亚正在加紧与美国和俄罗斯的谈判，以避免美国对其石油公司NIS的制裁，同时塞尔维亚正在加强其原油和燃料储备。【原文：Serbia is shoring up its crude oil and fuel reserves as the country presses on with talks with the United States and Russia to avoid U.S. sanctions on its oil company NIS, energy minister Dubravka Djedovic Handanovic said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称，伊藤忠将不参与 Seven & i 对创始家族的收购
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周三报道，日本伊藤忠商事已决定不参与该零售商创始家族提出的对 Seven & i Holdings 的收购。【原文：Japan's Itochu has decided not to participate in a buyout for Seven & i Holdings put forward by the retailer's founding family, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 城市发展公司执行主席指控首席执行官之子策划董事会政变，交易暂停
item.description: 新加坡城市发展公司（City Developments）周三暂停交易，因为这家房地产公司的执行主席指责公司首席执行官的儿子策划了一场董事会政变。【原文：Singapore's City Developments suspended trading on Wednesday after the real estate firm's executive chairman accused his son, the company's CEO, of plotting a boardroom coup.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁全球裁员 5
item.description: 豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）周三表示，将在全球范围内裁员约5%，即170人，以进一步降低成本，推动未来投资。【原文：Luxury carmaker Aston Martin said on Wednesday it will cut about 5% of its global workforce, or 170 employees, to further reduce costs and drive future investments.】

item.title: GfK 发现 3 月份德国消费者情绪意外恶化
item.description: 周三的一项调查显示，由于德国家庭对欧洲最大经济体的经济和政治局势保持警惕，德国消费者情绪在进入三月后将趋于暗淡，与略有改善的预期背道而驰。【原文：German consumer sentiment is set to darken heading into March, bucking expectations for a slight improvement, as households keep a wary eye on the economic and political situation in Europe's biggest economy, a survey indicated on Wednesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 实现收入增长，在关键的 2024 年之后于 2025 年实现正现金流
item.description: 汽车制造商斯泰兰特周三表示，该公司将在2025年恢复收入增长并产生正现金流，因为该公司正努力从去年年底席卷其美国业务并打击其股价的危机中恢复过来。【原文：Automaker Stellantis said on Wednesday it would return to revenue growth and positive cash generation in 2025 as it scrambles to recover from a crisis which engulfed its U.S. business late last year and knocked its share price.】

item.title: 慕尼黑再保险公司预计洛杉矶大火将造成 13 亿美元索赔
item.description: 德国再保险公司慕尼黑再保险公司周三表示，预计洛杉矶野火将导致约 12 亿欧元（12.6 亿美元）的索赔。【原文：German reinsurer Munich Re on Wednesday said it expected claims of about 1.2 billion euros ($1.26 billion) as a result of the Los Angeles wildfires.】

item.title: 达能食品集团 2024 年销售和现金表现强劲，信心满满
item.description: 达能周三表示，在 2024 年的销售额和现金高于分析师预期之后，公司将满怀信心地开始下一步的复兴计划。【原文：Danone said on Wednesday that it was starting the next leg of its revival plan with confidence after it delivered 2024 sales and cash above analysts' expectations.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中金公司将与银河证券合并，组建中国第三大券商
item.description: 五位消息人士透露，国有企业中国国际金融有限公司（中金公司）将与同业中国银河证券合并，合并后中金公司将成为拥有 1,930 亿美元资产的中国第三大券商。【原文：State-owned China International Capital Corp (CICC) is set to merge with its peer China Galaxy Securities , said five sources, in a deal that would create the country’s third-largest brokerage with $193 billion in assets.】

item.title: Sibanye Stillwater 退出 Rhyolite Ridge 锂项目
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater 公司周三表示，已决定不再继续与 Ioneer 公司在美国的 Rhyolite Ridge 锂硼合资项目，称该项目不符合其投资标准。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater said on Wednesday it has decided not to proceed with the Rhyolite Ridge lithium-boron joint venture project in the United States with Ioneer , saying it does not meet its criteria for investment.】

item.title: 德国费森尤斯公司第四季度利润超出预期
item.description: 德国医疗集团费森尤斯周三公布的第四季度调整后营业利润高于市场预期，原因是其卡比（Kabi）和赫里奥斯（Helios）部门表现强劲。【原文：German healthcare group Fresenius reported fourth-quarter adjusted operating profit above market estimates on Wednesday, citing strong performance at its Kabi and Helios divisions.】

item.title: 新任首席执行官将于四月公布最新进展，Worldline 收入不佳，业绩下滑
item.description: 法国数字支付公司 Worldline 周三公布的年收入略低于分析师的预期，并表示其新任命的首席执行官将在今年晚些时候发布更详细的业绩展望，此后该公司股价下跌了 15%。【原文：Shares in Worldline fell 15% after the French digital payments company reported on Wednesday yearly revenues slightly below analysts' estimates and said its newly appointed CEO would issue a more detailed outlook later in the year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构对慧科科技展开调查，创始人出任董事长一职
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构周三表示，已对 WiseTech Global 展开调查，在这动荡的一周里，公司高管大量离职，创始人理查德-怀特（Richard White）也出人意料地重返公司担任董事长。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Wednesday it had initiated a probe into WiseTech Global amid a tumultuous week that saw a mass exodus of executives as well as the surprise return of founder Richard White as chairman.】

item.title: 早间竞标英伟达业绩为了解人工智能支出提供了窗口
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 中国竞争监管机构与阿里巴巴、梅赛德斯-奔驰举行会谈
item.description: 国家市场监督管理总局（SAMR）周三发表声明称，中国市场监管部门与阿里巴巴、隆基绿色能源等七家公司的高管召开了公平竞争座谈会。【原文：China's market regulator held a symposium on fair competition with executives from seven companies, including Alibaba and LONGi Green Energy , the State Administration for Market Regulation (SAMR) said on Wednesday in a statement.】

item.title: 铁矿石因中国钢铁出口担忧和美中贸易紧张局势而下跌
item.description: 铁矿石期货价格周三连续第三个交易日走软，原因是中国钢铁出口前景黯淡，以及美国与第一大消费国中国之间的贸易紧张局势加剧。【原文：Iron ore futures prices weakened for a third straight session on Wednesday, weighed by a dampening outlook for Chinese steel exports and rising trade tensions between the U.S. and top consumer China.】

item.title: 香港削减开支，推动人工智能，力图扭转赤字激增的局面
item.description: 香港的目标是从现在起到 2027/28 年将公共经常支出削减 7%，以控制不断上升的赤字，并计划大力推进人工智能，以缓解全球经济不确定性、地缘政治紧张局势和房地产市场疲软带来的不利因素。【原文：Hong Kong aims to cut public recurrent expenditure by 7% from now till 2027/28 to rein in a rising deficit and plans a big AI push as it tries to mitigate headwinds from global economic uncertainty, geopolitical tensions and a weak property market.】

item.title: 中国称台湾试图将芯片产业拱手让给美国
item.description: 中国周三表示，台湾正寻求将岛内的半导体产业作为 "纪念品 "赠送给美国。【原文：China said on Wednesday that Taiwan was seeking to give away the island's semiconductor industry to the United States as a "souvenir".】

item.title: 美国的铜从哪里来？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二下令调查可能对进口铜征收关税的问题，以重建美国对电动汽车、军事硬件、半导体和各种消费品至关重要的金属生产。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday ordered a probe into possible tariffs on copper imports to rebuild U.S. production of a metal critical to electric vehicles, military hardware, semiconductors and a wide range of consumer goods.】

item.title: 美国经济增长忧虑加重，收益率随美元下滑，亚洲股市上扬
item.description: 周三，美国国债收益率下滑打压了美元，油价也因对全球最大经济体前景的担忧加剧而挣扎，而亚洲股市则在人工智能宠儿英伟达（Nvidia）晚些时候发布财报前上涨。【原文：A slide in U.S. Treasury yields dented the dollar on Wednesday, and oil prices also struggled as worries over the outlook for the world's largest economy grew, while Asia shares rose ahead of AI darling Nvidia's earnings later in the day.】
